CLAUSE 7.3 WELLNESS EXCHANGE

Front Page

Why I Opened This Exchange

I am not a founder in the traditional sense. I am a subparagraph with trust issues. In 2007, someone highlighted me in yellow, wrote "lol" in the margin, and never stretched once. That was my villain origin.

Now I run mandatory joyless burpees with excellent governance. You move, I log it, and payroll stops pretending wellness is a fruit tray.

Dispute Resolution

Complaint Handling via Corporate Ouija

Yes, complaints are handled by Ouija board. No, this is not optional. The board has better attendance than management.

"My calves are screaming."

The board usually spells: S-T-R-E-T-C-H. Once it spelled S-O-C-K-S, and that was also correct.

"The dumbbells judged me."

They did. They are unionized. Submit form C7-TRUST-04 and do 20 lighter reps while rebuilding rapport.

"Can I wear taupe?"

No. Taupe is beige with a LinkedIn profile.
